about_the_game:
A Short PSX Psychological Horror

You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. As you venture deeper into the woods, you stumble upon an old house. The air is thick with an unsettling silence.



would you like to come in, for a call?






Immerse yourself in a haunting PSX-style retro world, or will it consume you?.




Features:
  • 'Psychological' Horror: Immerse yourself in a PSX-style horror experience that delves deep into the psyche, blending fear with philosophy.
  • Interactive Dialogues: Engage in conversations with multiple dialogue choices that shape your story.
  • Story-Driven: Focused heavily on narrative, the game offers a gripping and thought-provoking story.
  • Multilingual Support: Enjoy the game in your preferred language with subtitle support for 15 different languages.
  • Beautiful Soundtrack: Experience an evocative and atmospheric soundtrack that enhances the surreal environment and emotional depth.
  • Short & Perfect for a Weekend: Designed to be completed over a single session in a weekend, offering a concise yet impactful experience.
  • Achievements: Unlock a full set of achievements, adding an extra layer of challenge and replayability.
  • Atmospheric: The game creates a deeply immersive atmosphere that captivates and unsettles, making every moment memorable.
  • Room for speculation: The story and dialogues are designed to provoke deep thoughts and speculation, leaving room for interpretation and personal reflection.




Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Shift for fast walk
  • E / controller for interaction
  • Space or Enter for dialogue
  • Arrow keys / controller to move between dialogues
detailed_description:
A Short PSX Psychological Horror

You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. As you venture deeper into the woods, you stumble upon an old house. The air is thick with an unsettling silence.



would you like to come in, for a call?






Immerse yourself in a haunting PSX-style retro world, or will it consume you?.




Features:
  • 'Psychological' Horror: Immerse yourself in a PSX-style horror experience that delves deep into the psyche, blending fear with philosophy.
  • Interactive Dialogues: Engage in conversations with multiple dialogue choices that shape your story.
  • Story-Driven: Focused heavily on narrative, the game offers a gripping and thought-provoking story.
  • Multilingual Support: Enjoy the game in your preferred language with subtitle support for 15 different languages.
  • Beautiful Soundtrack: Experience an evocative and atmospheric soundtrack that enhances the surreal environment and emotional depth.
  • Short & Perfect for a Weekend: Designed to be completed over a single session in a weekend, offering a concise yet impactful experience.
  • Achievements: Unlock a full set of achievements, adding an extra layer of challenge and replayability.
  • Atmospheric: The game creates a deeply immersive atmosphere that captivates and unsettles, making every moment memorable.
  • Room for speculation: The story and dialogues are designed to provoke deep thoughts and speculation, leaving room for interpretation and personal reflection.




Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Shift for fast walk
  • E / controller for interaction
  • Space or Enter for dialogue
  • Arrow keys / controller to move between dialogues

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 18.04 LTS / SteamOS 2.0 (or equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or equivalent with latest drivers
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan-compatible GPU required, latest Mesa or proprietary drivers recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / SteamOS 3.0 (or equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with latest drivers
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan-compatible GPU required, latest Mesa or proprietary drivers recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (Dual-core) or equivalent,Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Quad-core) or equivalent, Apple M1 ( or Higher )
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Cherophobia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. A short psychological horror game.
